title: A RESOLUTION APPROVING AND ADOPTING THE MUNICIPAL DISASTER RISK REDUCTION AND MANAGEMENT COUNCIL (MDRRMC) RESOLUTION NO. 2025- 04 DATED JULY 25, 2025, ENTITLED ”RESOLUTION APPROVING THE SUPPLEMENTAL INVESTMENT PLAN FOR THE 596 MUNICIPAL DISASTER RISK REDUCTION AND MANAGEMENT FUND CY 2025-3096 QUICK RESPONSE FUND AMOUNTING TO SEVEN MILLION SEVEN HUNPRED FIFTY-ONE THOUSAND FOUR HUNDRED FORTY-FIVE PESOS AND 68/100 (PH 7,75133?8).“
